name: Quick Balls
description:
Quick Balls is a student/personal project which i worked on during the Summer.

It's a small and simple game based on Pong with a ball with increasing speed.

You can play vs the IA or another player.

I hope you will enjoy it !

if you liked the game, do not hesitate to test my other projects on my page !
